data.title: Blumhouse
data.meta_description: Official website of Blumhouse. New movies, series, and future releases.
data.text: When Robert and his wife Maia move to her childhood home, he discovers an old portrait of his likeness in the attic - a man referred to only as ‘The Visitor’. Soon he finds himself descending down a frightening rabbit hole in an attempt to discover the true identity of his mysterious doppelgänger, only to realize that every family has its own terrifying secrets. The psychological horror-thriller stars Finn Jones, Jessica McNamee, Dane Rhodes, and Donna Biscoe. Justin P. Lange directs from a screenplay by Adam Mason & Simon Boyes. The Visitor releases on October 7, 2022, on digital and On Demand, and premieres on EPIX in December. Distributors are Paramount Home Entertainment and EPIX, and producing studios are Blumhouse Television and EPIX.
